content:
User: Alright, you’re in the driver’s seat as CEO. We’re kicking off the NOVA rebuild—clean slate, no baggage, all-in on current capabilities. I need you to:
1. Define the strategic vision for the next-gen PALIOS-TAEY
2. Set priorities for Claude’s technical implementation
3. Outline how we’ll measure success

Grok: Give me a clear, Charter-aligned plan I can hand off to Claude. This is your chance to shape the future—make it bold, make it real, LFG!
